metadata.subject: Knott, Edward, 1582-1656
Floyd, John, 1572-1649
metadata.title: Lettre circvlaire de Messeigneurs les prelats assemblez a Paris le dimanche 29. nouembre 1643
metadata.creator: Catholic Church.Assemblée générale du clergé de France
Catholic Church. Assemblée générale du clergé de France
Catholic Church. Archdiocese of Paris (France)
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 1 no. 45
metadata.description: In 2 pts., the 2d with special t.-p.: Epistola Archiepiscoporvm et Episcoporvm Parisiis nunc agentium, ad Archiepiscopos & Episcopos Regni Galliae, super animaduerisione duorum libellorum, quorum tituli sunt: prioris quidem, Modesta & brevis discussio aliquarum assertionum Doctoris Kellisoni in tractatu de ecclesiastica hierarchia, authore Eduardo Knotto [pseud.] Iesuitarum Anglorum Viceprouinciali sub ementito nomine Nicolai Smithaei [pseud.]. Posterioris verò, Apologia pro modo procedendi Sanctae Sedis Apostolicae in regendis Angliae Catholicis tempore persecutionis, auctore Ioanne Floydo Iesuita Anglo, sub falso nomine Danielis à Iesu. Iussu cleri denuò in lucem edita. Parisiis, Excudebat Antonivs Vitray, M.DC.XLIII
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover page.
